reviewText: This is the footage of the second year of the event and these videos of this most amazing off road event are the things of legend! buy this video and one of the more current videos to see the progression of the sport then attend next year February while there is still room for you in the desert!
Very well put together.  Video was sharp, music great.  For us die hard extreemys, more action is what we always want, but as a whole, a good representation of the event.  Will buy KOH 2010.
